description: This is a Dart source file for a Flutter app screen called HomeScreen. It represents the main interface with a calendar view and list of events, allowing users to view, add, and delete events on specific dates.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main calendar screen with event list and navigation.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the calendar and event list state, including UI build logic.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, calendar, event list, and FAB.

methods.name: _buildCalendar
methods.description: Creates the calendar widget with day selection and event markers.

methods.name: _buildDrawer
methods.description: Builds the navigation drawer with menu options.

methods.name: _emptyState
methods.description: Displays a placeholder when no events are present for a selected day.

methods.name: _friendlyDate
methods.description: Converts a DateTime object into a user-friendly string format.
